Title: Center CB cylinder thermostat 40-80c
Description: Center CB water temperature cylinder thermostat is designed for surface mounting on domestic hot water cylinders. It is supplied complete with mounting strap for rapid and easy installation. Draining of the system or tapping of the cylinder is not necessary.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Center CB cylinder thermostat 40-80c

Title: Drayton Digistat Plus digital radio frequency controlled cylinder thermostat
Description: User-friendly, the Drayton Digistat Plus C RF thermostat, SCR and sensor offers tactile, audible and visual feedback for confident use. It combines a familiar dial control with a digital display, showing that the temperature has been set accurately. This cylinder thermostat controls domestic hot water temperature and can help the user to save energy when set between the recommended 60 and 65°C temperature.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Drayton Digistat Plus digital radio frequency controlled cylinder thermostat

Title: Danfoss ATC ATC cylinder thermostat
Description: Using a spring-clamping band, the Danfoss ATC electro-mechanical cylinder thermostat offers easy, quick wall-mounted installation.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Danfoss ATC ATC cylinder thermostat

Title: Drayton cylinder thermostat
Description: Controlling domestic hot water, this Drayton HTS3 cylinder thermostat provides ideal comfort to suit the user's lifestyle and can make energy and cost savings when set at the recommended level of 60 to 65°C.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Drayton cylinder thermostat

Title: Salamander surrey flange for hot water cylinder 22mm
Description: Suitable for 22mm hot water cylinders, this Salamander Surrey flange is made of a robust ductile iron with a galvanised finish. Preventing aerated supply water from being drawn into the pump, this flange is intended to encourage aeration towards the vent.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Salamander surrey flange for hot water cylinder 22mm

Title: Danfoss RAVI RAVI-VMT 20/8 combi cylinder valve 22/8"
Description: An easy upgrade, the Danfoss RAVI thermostatic cylinder valve with 20mm connections offers the benefits of temperature-controlled hot water, without the mess and inconvenience of lifting floorboards. A non-electric alternative to motorised valve and electric cylinder thermostats, RAVI is available in two port versions for pumped and gravity systems, and in three port versions for pumped systems. Designed for clamp-on mounting, using a strap and adhesive pad, this valve is easy to install and where immersion sensing is required, an immersion pocket or capillary gland seal can be purchased.
category: Water Heating and Storage/Hot Water Cylinders/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls/Cylinder Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Danfoss RAVI RAVI-VMT 20/8 combi cylinder valve 22/8"
